entry.title: New release for WatchState: v0.1.1

entry.title: New release for WatchState: v0.1.4
entry.content:
As the code-base has been stabilized, we are preparing to hopefully tag v1.0.0 final release in this quarter. We are no longer seeing any bugs that would require us to make major changes which might be breaking change. There are some backwards compatibility settings implemented, and those will be removed in the final release.

  • aec20b8 Added Path to handle pathing logic. by arabcoders
  • 8cb2d9f Fixes some expectations by arabcoders
  • 283f78b Fixed incorrect normalizing path in windows by arabcoders
  • 945aaa8 In rare cases, jellyfin doesn't reset the PlaybackPositionTicks by arabcoders
  • f8256fc Minor fixes for Path class by arabcoders
  • 1a8c5bb Merge pull request #699 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen
